notes: Use for incorrect morphological form not covered under specific grammar tags.
Orthography only; meaning intended is clear.
Keep if manual uses it; might be infrequent in elementary writing.
For countable/uncountable selection see XNUC (Lexico-grammar) if that is the intended category.
If specifically subject-verb agreement, prefer GVN.

desc_en: Finite vs non-finite form selection error

notes: If dependent on specific head word, consider X*PR tags.
If the missing item is clearly an article/determiner/pronoun/aux etc, prefer the relevant Grammar tag.
Useful to separate style/awkwardness from clear errors.
